column2: Writing user input directly to an HTTP response allows for a cross-site scripting vulnerability.
An HTTP request handler that performs expensive operations without restricting the rate at which operations can be carried out is vulnerable to denial-of-service attacks.
column4: This route handler performs [["a file system access"|"relative:///simplehttpserver.js:102:5:123:6"]], but is not rate-limited.
